text: This article lists the winners of the annual end-of-season awards in the Scottish Football League (SFL). The end-of-season annual awards were made by the Scottish Football League (SFL) until the league ceased operating after the end of the 2012–13 season. The awards were presented by the various sponsors of the Scottish Football League (SFL), including Bell's (1994–1998 and 1999–2006) and Irn-Bru (2007–2013). == Winners == === Before 1998=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
